vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.2;
son of: Abraham (H0085) and Keturah (H6989);
half-brother of: Ishmael (H3458) and Isaac (H3327);
brother of: Zimran (H2175), Jokshan (H3370), Medan (H4091), Midian (H4080) and Ishbak (H3435)
§ Shuah = "wealth"
son of Abraham by his wife Keturah
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
書亞 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "財富"
亞伯拉罕和他的妾基土拉所生的兒子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
书亚 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "财富"
亚伯拉罕和他的妾基土拉所生的儿子
